plot outline: Mareyada Deepavali is a 1972 Indian Kannada film, directed by R Sampath and Produced by M Jagannath Rao.The film Stars Kalpana, Rajesh, K S Ashwath, Sudarshan, Sampath, Ramachandra Shastry, Chethan, Shastry in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar Watch the full MovieMareyada Deepavali online, only On Eros Now.
